attributes.10: note<small>* - uncredited appearance</small>==In the books==In the ''Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Gyles Rosby is the head of House Rosby, a noble house that rules over an eponymous town in the Crownlands. He's noted for being sickly and constantly coughing.==See also==* AWOIAF (major spoilers from the books)==References==Reflist
attributes.title: Gyles Rosby

sections.In the books: In the ''[[Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Gyles Rosby is the head of House Rosby, a noble house that rules over an eponymous town in the Crownlands. He's noted for being sickly and constantly coughing.
